Class summary: DockerSandbox: Manages Docker-based sandbox environments, providing utilities to build container images from source code, launch generic or Python-specific sandboxes, and clean up the containers after use.

Summary: "The module orchestrates Docker-based sandboxes, offering functions to construct container images from source code, start generic or Python‑specific containers, manage dependencies and credentials, and tear down the containers after execution."

Business intent: "Enable a platform to run untrusted or user‑provided code safely by executing it inside isolated Docker environments, handling image preparation, runtime configuration, and resource cleanup."

Keywords list: ["docker", "sandbox", "container", "image building", "code execution", "isolation", "dependency extraction", "credential handling", "environment cleanup", "Python runtime", "generic container", "filesystem", "RESTful", "SQL"]
